radiographic_examinations.findings: Normal parenchymal signal and patent vascular structures; small amount of fluid suggesting ascites.
No evidence of a hematoma, ischemic injury, or masses.
Abnormal hyperintensity of the basal ganglia on T1-weighted images.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Thought to be related to preexisting chronic liver disease.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Clear lungs and a small pleural effusion on the right side.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: No change from the previous study.
